title: The oration and declaration of the French King, Henrie the fourth of that name and by the grace of God, King of Nauarre. Vttered out of his owne mouth, to the lords and gentlemen of his armie, before the citie of Paris, the eight day of this present moneth of August 1590.
author: Henry IV, King of France, 1553-1610.
publisher: Printed by Richard Field for Iohn B[owen] and are to be sold by Humfrey Lownes at the West dore of Paules,
notes: Identified as STC 13114a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Peterborough Cathedral. Library.
